scenario_text.value: Hm? Who’s that running this way?
Huh?! Takuma?! What are you doing here?!

Oh, um... Well what about you? Doing some
kind of training here?
Now is this really the time to—

Wait...what?! You mean that thing’s been
chasing you?!
That guy seems like bad news...!

You can tell, too?! That’s why I’ve been
acting as bait to draw it away!
So you became a decoy? That’s too reckless!
Reckless or not, it’s something I gotta do!

No more time to explain, Miu! It’s about to
strike!
Grr...! Takuma, I’ll hold it off!
You get out of here, now!!!

Just GO, already!!! We’re doing this,
Shakomon!
